1st star: John Gibson
2nd star: Jakob Silfverberg
3rd star: Rickard Rakell
               
Notes for San Jose Sharks:
-Nick Spaling finally ended his 21 game goal drought.
-Artemi Panarin had his 6 game point streak snapped.

Notes for Anaheim Ducks:
-Colin Wilson notched his 10th assist of the season.
-Jakob Silfverberg ended his 6 game goal drought.
-Rickard Rakell finally ended his 11 game goal drought.
-Rickard Rakell finally ended his 11 game point drought.
-Cam Fowler had his 3 game goal streak snapped.
